Question: This person's success in stand-up led to his own NBC variety show in 1961, The ____ Show.
Hints: This person ended in 1990 after eight seasons and 182 episodes.
This person himself "warmed up" the studio audience with a five-to-eight-minute routine before the filming of every episode.
Transcripts of many of this person's classic routines are woven in with the rest of the text.
